Package com.azure.spring.messaging.eventhubs.core

package com.azure.spring.messaging.eventhubs.core
Spring Messaging Event Hubs core package.

  • Class
    Description
    DefaultEventHubsNamespaceProcessorFactory
    The EventHubsProcessorFactory implementation to produce new EventProcessorClient instances for provided CheckpointStore checkpointStore and optional NamespaceProperties and processor PropertiesSupplier on each DefaultEventHubsNamespaceProcessorFactory.createProcessor(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.azure.spring.cloud.service.listener.MessageListener<?>, com.azure.spring.cloud.service.eventhubs.consumer.EventHubsErrorHandler) invocation.
    DefaultEventHubsNamespaceProducerFactory
    The EventHubsProducerFactory implementation to produce cached EventHubProducerAsyncClient instances for provided NamespaceProperties and optional producer PropertiesSupplier on each DefaultEventHubsNamespaceProducerFactory.createProducer(java.lang.String) invocation.
    EventHubsProcessorFactory
    The strategy to produce EventProcessorClient instance.
    EventHubsProcessorFactory.Listener
    Called whenever a processor is added or removed.
    EventHubsProducerFactory
    The strategy to produce EventHubProducerAsyncClient instance.
    EventHubsProducerFactory.Listener
    Called whenever a producer is added or removed.
    EventHubsTemplate
    A template for executing sending operations asynchronously to Event Hubs.
    PartitionSupplier
    Represents a supplier of partition id or key.
